#### Procuring substances that many governments have deemed illegal

Many governments, including the United Kingdom and the United States have deemed illegal many substances.  This is not because they are concerned with the welfare of their citizens but because they realise the power of these drugs to enlighten and empower everyone.

* LSD was used during the MKULTRA experiments and methamphetamine has been used by the military for years to keep armed forces fighting without fatigue.

* As shown by Iran/Contra, the CIA has no issue in using the proceeds of confiscated cocaine to fund revolutions in other countries.

* These drugs can be used for the benefit of all and not just those who seek to control every aspect of our lives, from birth to death.

* You can use Tor Browser to access sites that will deliver these drugs to you. Is this risky? Of course. Nothing worthwhile comes without risk - although I have yet to hear of a "user" being arrested as a result of using these sites. 

* Download one of the tools below (warning - outside ZeroNet) to gain access to these sites

[Tor Browser](https://www.torproject.org/projects/torbrowser.html)

[TAILS](https://tails.boum.org/)

Once you have done so, use the following link within the Tor Browser to find an up-to-date list of marketplaces:

http://deepdot35wvmeyd5.onion/

#### The Origins of Consciousness

Consciousness created maths - that is to say, the contrast between "being conscious" and "not being conscious" gave the concepts of 0 and 1. From this it is possible to deduce every other rule of mathematics. With that in mind, and bearing in mind current thought on the matter - consciousness created maths, the study of maths becomes physics, the study physics becomes chemistry, the study of chemistry becomes biology and the study of biology becomes psychology.

_The only thing the current paradigm had wrong was to put maths at the bottom of the pyramid - consciousness creates all things._
